title: Clearlake Capital to Buy Quest Software From Francisco Partners
sub_head: Deal values former Dell unit at $5.4 billion, including debt, sources say
body:
Clearlake Capital Group LP has struck a deal to buy Quest Software Inc. from Francisco Partners in the latest sign of private-equity firmsâ€™ voracious appetite for software.
The deal, expected to be announced as soon as Monday, values Quest at $5.4 billion including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.
